title: Slider API - SliderProvider - SliderProvider Context
content:
<PropName
  name="currentSlideIndex"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
The index of the current slide.
<PropName
  name="sliderTrackRef"
  type="object"
  isContextProp
/>
A reference to the <SliderTrack>.
<PropName
  name="goToNextSlide"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Navigates to the next slide. If on the last slide, navigates to the first.
<PropName
  name="goToPrevSlide"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Navigates to the previous slide. If on the first slide, navigates to the last.
<PropName
  name="goToSlideIndex"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Navigates to the given slide index.
<PropName
  name="slides"
  type="array"
  isContextProp
/>
An array of every slide in the slider.
<PropName
  name="isPaused"
  type="boolean"
  isContextProp
/>
Returns whether the slider is currently paused. One applicable when pauseOnHover is true.
<PropName
  name="scrollRatio"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
The current scroll progress of the slider.
<PropName
  name="slideWidth"
  type="string"
  isContextProp
/>
The width of each slide in pixels, based on slidesToShow.
<BasicContext href="#sliderprovider-props" />
</JumplistNode>
<JumplistNode nodeID="track">
